title: Industrial ecotoxicology in focus: The unexplored environmental impacts of pilot-scale advanced filtration in Sc recovery
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Ildikó Fekete-Kertész, Rita Márton, Mónika Molnár, Zsófia Berkl, Sebastian Hedwig, Viktória Feigl
